SELECT r.id, r.admin_id AS adminId, r.user_id AS userId, r.kakao_user_id AS kakaoUserId, r.user_name AS userName, r.user_phone AS userPhone, r.status AS status, r.check_in_time AS checkIn, r.check_out_time AS checkOut, a.name AS adminName FROM reservation r LEFT JOIN admin a ON r.admin_id = a.id WHERE r.id = #{id}

SELECT a.name AS trainer_name FROM admin a JOIN reservation r ON a.id = r.admin_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(r.date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') GROUP BY a.id, a.name DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT id, name, gender, birth, email, phone, workplace, certificate_path AS certificateFileName, code, workplace_name_id AS workplaceNameId, favorite FROM admin ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT id, admin_id AS adminId, name, phone, created_at AS createdAt FROM user ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT a.id, a.name, w.workplace_name AS workplaceName, COUNT(r.id) AS reservationCount FROM admin a LEFT JOIN reservation r ON a.id = r.admin_id AND DATE_FORMAT(r.check_in_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') /* 이번 달만 */ LEFT JOIN workplace_name w ON a.workplace_name_id = w.id GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY reservationCount DESC, a.id ASC /* 예약 많이 한 순 → 동률이면 id 오름차순 */ LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT DATE(check_in_time) AS statDate, COUNT(*) AS count FROM reservation WHERE check_in_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(check_in_time) ORDER BY statDate
